Text.Page:
Killian must have designed this ritual. Nobody's more versed in pain—I'm sure Thulsa knew that.

Killian sent a vicious spectre to torture the victims—before and after they die—and channel all that misery for power.

Well, no more. Kill that spectre!

Fates be damned, you did it! I could hear Vaelmir screaming from here!

No consolation for the dead, but don't you dare pay for your own drinks when we get back to town.
